allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Concox/GT06 IMEI extraction with leading zeros

Fixed bug where IMEI with multiple leading zeros was not matching Asset serial number. Changed from removing only 1 leading zero to using TrimStart(''0'') to remove all leading zeros.

This was preventing GT06 devices from associating with their Assets when IMEI had format like 0000018404228323.

Changes:
- ConcoxMessageHandler.GetImei(): Replace single character removal with TrimStart(''0'')

EOF
)")
